1.title: Welcome to Snaplook
1.message: Explore other's looks and give them a like so they can discover which looks better

2.title: Share Your Looks
2.message: Are you shopping? Or Going out on a date? Discover which looks better. Don't be shy. All looks disappear after 24 hours.

1.title: Great Job!
1.message: Share your looks to your friends and family. Ask them which looks better.

2.title: Pull to Refresh
2.message: Now your looks are public for 24 hours. Other users will start vote on your looks. Refresh to see updated votes.

3.title: Sort by Attractiveness
3.message: Discover Which look appeals to which group. The most appealing look goes on top and the least goes on bottom.

4.title: Come Back Any Time
4.message: While you are waiting, try vote on other's look. You can come back any time to see which looks better.
